ax.ha.it.smsalarm

Class UpdateHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application
      • ax.ha.it.smsalarm.UpdateHandler

  • public class UpdateHandler
extends Application
    Responsible for any update actions. In other words if some changes has been made in current release of the application that needs to have some code executed(action) done after update that code is managed by this class. Code that needs to be executed after update is placed in onCreate() method.
    To figure out if the application has been updated the version code is stored in SharedPreferences, and at the end of the onCreate() method the current version code is always stored to shared preferences, this way that code within onCreate() is executed more than one time.
    Since:
    2.2
    Version:
    2.2
    Author:
    Robert Nyholm
